com.williballenthin.rejistry

Class REGFHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.williballenthin.rejistry.BinaryBlock
      • com.williballenthin.rejistry.REGFHeader

  • public class REGFHeader
extends BinaryBlock
    REGFHeader is the file header structure for a Registry hive.

      • getHBINs

        @Nullable
public java.util.Iterator<HBIN> getHBINs()
        getHBINs creates an iterator over the HBINs that make up this hive. The iterator does not support the `remove` operation.
        Returns:
        An iterator over the HBINs of this hive.

      • getFirstHBIN

        public HBIN getFirstHBIN()
                  throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        getFirstHBIN fetches the first HBIN in the Registry hive, or raises an exception if the hive is empty.
        Returns:
        The first HBIN in this hive.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - Better to throw exception than return null.

      • getRootNKRecord

        @NotNull
public NKRecord getRootNKRecord()
                                  throws RegistryParseException
        getRootNKRecord fetches the NKRecord that the Hive claims as the root.
        Returns:
        The root NKRecord.
        Throws:
        RegistryParseException - if the creation of the NKRecord fails, or there are no HBINs in this Hive.
